gov.usgs.anss.edgemom

Class EdgeMom.EdgeMomMonitorServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • gov.usgs.anss.edgemom.EdgeMom.EdgeMomMonitorServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    EdgeMom

    public final class EdgeMom.EdgeMomMonitorServer
extends java.lang.Thread
    This server sends a string of Key-Value pairs with monitoring information on the process. These are generally used by Nagios or other monitoring software to track the state of this EdgeMom instance.
